website_summaries.verdict: Specially formulated with ginger and artichoke to be gentle on the stomach and improve digestion.
pros: Made with organic fruits and vegetables, this multivitamin is a well-rounded supplement with clean sources
Adding more vitamin B, spirulina, and botanicals like Red Clover will give you a boost of energy
cons: Considerably more expensive than other multivitamins
If you aren't looking for the energy-boosting herbs, this might not be for you

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product so far
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product so far. Love that it's plant based formula and easily digestible. We need to demand more honest production of vitamins. love your body and what goes into it. Thank you Rainbow Light!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Dosage is 4 a day.
customer_reviews.text: Had I known the dosage was 4 a day I would of never purchased these. Way too much money.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: so good. They don't bother my stomach at all and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for a week now, and so far, so good. They don't bother my stomach at all and my energy level during the day seems pretty even. It's nice that they don't turn your urine bright yellow like some other multivitamins!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: They are working
customer_reviews.text: Helping with energy, reduction in illness and positivity level when um taking them regurlarly.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these vitamins. Easy to swallow compared to the other brand
customer_reviews.author: Mackobubis

customer_reviews.title: Take 4 pills a day not 1
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to try a new vitamin as I have Been feeling sluggish for a while. Now to take FOUR a day. Nope can’t do it as I forget to take them. So now I need To find a ONE A DAY pill. Other than that I guess I have A little more energy. But have had 2 random nose bleeds. Not sure if related but definitely odd. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: I love the Omegas
customer_reviews.text: I dont see an increase in mental alertness or energy in multi vitamin.I love the Omegas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and keeps me on! I feel so much better when taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins were okay, but I didn't notice a ...
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins were okay, but I didn't notice a big enough difference to justify the cost. They're way overpriced for what you get, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Whitener

customer_reviews.title: Hormonal changes....Dong Quai
customer_reviews.text: So....I took this for about two months. It made me feel fantastic. I had lots of energy and my mood mellowed out which was great. However, I'm 36 and I started having a period every two weeks, which is not cool. I did some research and it's likely the Dong Quai. It affects your hormones, mainly estrogen, so if you have breast cancer or are at high risk for breast cancer or if you have any other other condition, like endometriosis, that can be adversely affected by an increase in estrogen, stay away. I stopped taking it about a week ago and I can already tell my cycle is normalizing and my moodiness is back, Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins work
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins really work. I kept falling asleep each morning after the alarm went off every morning. Now I'm able to get up and get moving.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Always a fan of Rainbow
customer_reviews.text: Pricey? Yes. Do they work? Probably. I have bought their products for years and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase for Rainbow Light. I feel a lot better after taking these vitamins. They give me energy and helps with stress. Fully recommend. I will continue to order this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that I have to take 4 pills a day! It is hard to remember.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

product_meta.title: Rainbow Light Vibrance Women's Multivitamin Plus Balance & Energy, 120 Count Capsules, Dietary Supplement Made with Whole Foods
product_meta.description: Feel vibrant and energized each day to live the life you want with new Rainbow Light Vibrance Women’s Multivitamin plus Balance & Energy. This advanced, research-based formula is specifically formulated to support a woman’s distinct health needs with a wide variety of vitamins and minerals, plus targeted nutrients to promote feminine balance and energy. The comprehensive B-vitamin complex provides steady energy to get you through your day. To promote bone health, you get 1,000 IU of vitamin D. For support of estrogen metabolism, the formula includes diindolylmethane (DIM). You get vitamins C, D, and E, plus zinc to fortify the immune system. And, to ease digestive complaints and promote gut health, the formula includes 25 million CFU of probiotics, plus prebiotics, and a full spectrum of plant-sourced digestive enzymes. For wholesome, food-based nutrition, Women’s Multivitamin plus Balance & Energy includes 1,076 mg of an Organic Antioxidant Fruit & Vegetable Blend of spirulina, lingonberry/cranberry, acai, lycium, pomegranate, blueberry, broccoli, kale, and beet. These antioxidant-rich foods work to scavenge free radicals and help fight the signs of aging. Organic rhodiola and green tea provide additional support for feminine balance, energy and mood. And, organic artichoke and ginger helps ensure the formula is easy on the stomach
feature_bullets: Eases digestive complaints and supports gut health
